title: Software Engineer
description:
Company: GoodSpace AI
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Compensation: ‚Çπ12 ‚Äì 15 LPA
 



 Experience: 1 ‚Äì 3 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



 GoodSpace AI is redefining how companies hire. Our AI\\-driven recruitment platform helps founders and HR teams find, evaluate, and hire qualified talent within 24 hours ‚Äî eliminating the need for endless screening and manual interviews.
 



 We‚Äôre a fast\\-growing startup backed by strong technology and passionate people who believe in making hiring 10x faster and smarter.
 



  





 Role Overview:
 



 We‚Äôre looking for a Software Engineer to join our core product team and help us build scalable, intelligent systems that power our AI recruitment engine. You‚Äôll work on real problems ‚Äî from automating candidate evaluation to building AI\\-driven matching pipelines ‚Äî while contributing to a modern, high\\-performance product stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 \\-Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices for our AI hiring platform.
 



 \\-Work closely with product and AI teams to integrate ML/LLM\\-based features into production.
 



 \\-Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.
 



 \\-Optimize system performance and reliability as our user base grows rapidly.
 



 \\-Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and feature planning.
 



 \\-Collaborate cross\\-functionally with designers, data scientists, and backend engineers.
 



  





 What You‚Äôll Need:
 



 \\-1‚Äì3 years of experience in backend or full\\-stack development.
 



 \\-Strong command of Python, Node.js, or Go (Python preferred).
 



 \\-Experience with RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL/MySQL, and Docker.
 



 \\-Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 \\-Good understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design.

title: Back End Developer
description:
Location: Remote
 



 Experience: 0‚Äì1 years
 



 Compensation: ‚Çπ12\\-15 LPA
 



 Company: GoodSpace (AI\\-powered Job \\& Career Platform)
 



  





 About GoodSpace
 



  





 GoodSpace is an AI\\-powered job platform helping job seekers find opportunities faster and helping employers hire more efficiently. Our AI engine powers personalized job recommendations, automated screening, and seamless career journeys. We‚Äôre expanding our engineering team to build scalable systems that support millions of users.
 



  





 Role Overview
 



  





 We‚Äôre looking for a Backend Developer who can design and build robust, scalable, and high\\-performance backend systems. You‚Äôll work closely with the product and AI teams to develop APIs, improve system architecture, and ensure high reliability across our platform.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 



  





 Develop, maintain, and scale backend services and APIs powering the GoodSpace platform.
 



  





 Design efficient data models, handle large datasets, and optimize database performance.
 



  





 Write clean, maintainable, and well\\-tested code.
 



  





 Collaborate with frontend, AI/ML, and product teams to ship features rapidly.
 



  





 Improve system reliability, observability, and performance.
 



  





 Ensure security, data protection, and compliance across backend systems.
 



  





 Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and technical decision\\-making.
 



  





 Requirements
 



  





 Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
 



  





 1‚Äì4 years of backend development experience.
 



  





 Strong command of one or more backend languages/frameworks:
 



  





 Node.js, Python (FastAPI / Django), Go, or Java.
 



  





 Solid understanding of REST APIs, microservices, and distributed systems.
 



  





 Strong knowledge of databases (PostgreSQL/MySQL, MongoDB, Redis).
 



  





 Experience with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and containerisation (Docker).
 



  





 Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps basics.
 



  





 Strong debugging, problem\\-solving, and architectural skills.
 



  





 Good to Have

 Why Join GoodSpace?

title: Flutter Firebase Intern (3 Months-3k/m-Remote-PPO)
description:
**Job Title:** 
 Flutter Firebase Developer Intern
 



**Location:** 
 Remote (India)
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Stipend: 3000 INR** 




  





**Company Description: Mind Turf,** 
 established on May 19, 2022, is an online platform providing customized support through counseling and therapy services. Located in New Delhi, we offer easy access, anonymity, and the convenience of seeking help from home. Our panel of psychologists and counselors provide individual therapy, couple therapy, family therapy, and our unique Vent Out Services, catering to individuals on their personal wellness journeys.
 



  





**Required Skills:** 



* Proficient in
 **Flutter** 
 and
 **Dart** 
 with a solid understanding of state management techniques (e.g., Provider, River pod, etc.).
* Strong grasp of
 **Firebase services** 
 : Fire store, Authentication, Cloud Functions, Cloud Messaging, and Firebase Storage.
* Experience with
 **Node.js** 
 for
 **writing and deploying Firebase Cloud Functions** 
 .
* Deep understanding of
 **MVVM (Model\\-View\\-View\\-Model) architecture** 
 and its application in Flutter.
* Hands\\-on experience with
 **API integration, including authentication, pagination, and real\\-time data updates.**
* Solid knowledge of scalability principles for both frontend and backend systems.
* Proven experience in app optimization for performance, battery, and responsiveness.
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field is a plus.



  





**Preferred Candidate:** 
 Need someone who has developed and deployed a
 **Mobile Application on Google Play store or Apple App Store or both, using Flutter from scratch.** 




  





 You are a great fit if you:
 


* Have
 **built and shipped apps from scratch \\- and loved it.**
* You are
 **hungry to build something impactful and world\\-class.**
* Take
 **ownership without being asked \\- and bring solutions, not problems** 
 .
* Are
 **high on energy, low on ego, and never say that's not my job.**
* Want to
 **be in the room where 0\\-to\\-1 decisions happen.**
* Can
 **debug at 3 AM** 
 !
* You
 **DO NOT consider yourself as an ordinary developer.**



  





**Perks \\& Benefits:** 



* Hands\\-on experience in mobile app development with real\\-world applications.
* Mentorship from experienced developers.
* **Good salary package after the completion with company stocks options.**
* Your
 **performance can bring you to our core team.**
* Opportunity to contribute to an innovative product.
* Certificate of completion and potential full\\-time opportunities on/before completion of internship.



  





 Interested candidates can send their resume to hr@mindturf.us. Please mention "Flutter Firebase Mobile App Developer Intern Application" in the subject line.
